screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 50, textsize[1] + 50) offset = 0 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 60 wsizex = textsize[0] + 60 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (280 > wsizex): wsizex = 280 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) listsize = (wsizex, 50) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(0, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()/2))

screen.name: ChoiceBox
screen.title: Input
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 50, textsize[1] + 50) count = len(self.list) if count > 10: count = 10 offset = 25 * count wsizex = textsize[0] + 60 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (520 > wsizex): wsizex = 520 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) listsize = (wsizex, 25 * count) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(0, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint((1024-wsizex)/2, (576-wsizey)/(count > 7 and 2 or 3)))
